title: Veiled Temple of the Obsidian Magus
story: For a millenium the temple of the Obsidian Magus was considered lost. Lately a fearsome fire-breathing owl has made its lair here. The temple of the Obsidian Magus is a place of growth of a valuable specie of blooms.

notes.text: A great stone door with a keyhole to the north.
A writing on the wall painted in blood: UNCOVER YOUR INNER BLOOD
A key in a battered chest.
